content:
FAU head coach Lane Kiffin during the first half of the game against FAU Sept PERIOD  PERIOD

Lane Kiffin cant get enough of Kyler Murray PERIOD

The Florida Atlantic coach tweeted Thursday that he thinks Kyler Murray is the best player in college football that isnt Alabamas Tua Tagovailoa PERIOD

Oklahoma Sooners Kyler Murray is the best player in college football not named Tua Tagovailoa agree httpst.cohtr49Jpkct

Kiffin is familiar with both quarterbacks facing Murray in the season opener this year and coaching at Alabama the year before Tagovailoa arrived in Tuscaloosa PERIOD

Murray only played one half against Kiffins Eagles going 9of11 for  yards and two touchdowns PERIOD This season Murray has been sensational totaling for  yards and  touchdowns PERIOD

Murray and the Sooners will be back in action this weekend against Oklahoma State at  p.m PERIOD on ESPN PERIOD
